content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel lonely after breaking up with my girlfriend.
That' s really hard to deal with, I know you' re going through a tough time. Do you have anyone in your life that you can talk to about your feelings?
I don't have many friends. They are all very busy.
I understand how you feel. It' s definitely rough at times, I' m sure you' re doing pretty well with social distancing. Is there anything that you' d like to talk to me about?

situation: I feel lonely after breaking up with my girl friend
